name: Cursed Dungeon (Dupix)
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40 jam

Steve the treasure-hunter faces the challenges of the most cursed cave no one has made to come out alive, because greed is the biggest curse. You must gather all treasures to clear the dungeon.

-Challenge the cursest dungeon to prove you are the real treasure hunter

Dev Team

RoberCJ: https://robercj.itch.io/

Gonzalo Tirado: https://gonztirado.itch.io/
